title: NYC Eats
description: Transformed an existing application with static design that lacks accessibility into a responsive, accessibility complying, offline-first web application.

title: Memory Game
description: A browser-based, feature-packed responsive card matching web application(also known as Concentration); built using JavaScript timer and Web Storage API.

title: My Reads
description: A responsive web application with a dynamic user interface built using React.js that allows users to select and categorize books into a virtual bookshelf.

title: Trending in Tampa Bay
description: A single-page responsive Google Maps web application displaying top trending places at Foursquare in Tampa Bay area.

title: Frogger Game Clone
description: An HTML5 Canvas powered variation of the classic Frogger arcade game, developed using the best practices in Object Oriented JavaScript.

title: Random Quotes
description: A responsive website displaying random quotes extracted from wikiquote.org; a tweet button allows the users to post their favorite quotes.

title: Cat Clicker
description: A web application implementing MVC design pattern with Vanilla JS (and of course with lots of cute cat images); cat images fetched from Unsplash API.

title: Raftaar
description: A personalized dashboard Chrome Extension featuring to-do list, weather, and inspirational quotes; built in collaboration with a remote team.

title: Feed Reader Testing using Jasmine
description: This project consists of test suites built using the Jasmine framework to test against an RSS Feed app.

title: Pixel Art Maker
description: A web application to draw pixel art; uses jQuery for event handling.
